Lee Seungyoon

Korean: 이승윤

Lee Seungyoon
Native name:
이승윤
Birthday:
Aug 21, 1989
Age:
35 years old
Height:
5'10" (177 cm)

Introduction

Lee Seungyoon is a South Korean singer/songwriter and was the vocalist of the now-disbanded indie rock band Alary-Kansion. He debuted as a soloist in 2013 with the single "Today", but gained more popularity thanks to participating and winning the first edition of JTBC "Sing Again" competition in 2020.
